Computers and Electronics Manufacturing
Dongguan, Guangdong
193 followers
About us
Focused on active noise canceling headphones, anc headset, wireless headphones, wireless earphones, gaming headset, wireless earbuds, tws earphones and true wireless earbuds, established in 1998, Dongguan Yong Fang Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd is one of the professional manufacturer from Donguan, Guangdong, China. We have more than 23 years of international OEM and ODM manufacturing service experiences. In our 6000 square meter sized and completely equipped factory, there are 8 well equipped productions lines. In all, we have more than 150 skillful and experienced employees. The daily production capacity is up to 5000-8000 pcs. Besides, we have a professional R&D team for original and creative new designs, including 3D engineers, electronics engineers, acoustic engineers, graphics designing and more. For all products from our factory, they are strictly checked by our team based on the reliability and safety standards in our standard reliability testing lab, and for most of the products, they are with CE, ROHS, Reach, FCC, Sound pressure, KC and other testing reports or certificates.Our goal is to be your great long term global manufacturing partner providing great products and services. Till now, we have been honestly and professionally providing original, creative, and quality products and customer satisfaction-oriented services to more than 100 customers from more than 87 different countries and areas.

results.title: wireless over ear headphones | YongFang Electronics
results.content: About Us Established in the year of 1998, Dongguan Yong Fang Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd is one of the professional manufacturing factory supplier with more than 25 years of global OEM and ODM manufacturing service experiences based on the innovative and premium wireless & wired Headphones earphones, and headsets.
results.raw_content:
Scan qrcode to view mobile website
About Us
Established in the year of 1998, Dongguan Yong Fang Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd is one of the professional manufacturing factory supplier with more than 25 years of global OEM and ODM manufacturing service experiences based on the innovative and premium wireless & wired Headphones earphones, and headsets.
With BSCI,Sedex,GRS,ISO9001,and ISO14001certificates,our factory is professionally focused on premium quality and creative products with latest audio and wireless technologies for the great products with really ultimate acoustic experiences. Our major product series are air conduction earbuds, active noise canceling headphones, dual mode 2.4G Hz wireless gaming headphones, true wireless stereo earphones, TWS with ANC, TWS with ENC, gaming earphones with smart dual microphone design, wireless headphones, wireless sports earbuds , wireless kids headsets, USB C headsets and wired earphones.
Besides, we have the professional R&D team for original and creative new product designs, including ID engineers, 3D engineers, electronics engineers, acoustic engineers, graphics designers and more. At present, we have more than 20 global design patents and 89 domestic design patents.
We have been honestly and professionally providing original, creative, reliable and premium quality products and customer satisfaction-oriented services to more than 100 brands from different countries and areas. And, we always positively and passionately keep moving and enjoy changes to be your best long term reliable and strategic partner.
Contact Us
E-mail：info@dgyongfang.com
Mobile：+86-13926859174
Tel：86-0769-86255736
Fax：86-0769-86255736
Add: No.12, Long'an Road, Shigu,
Tangxia, Dongguan, Guangdong,
523729 China

results.title: Company Overview-Dongfang Electronics Co., Ltd.
results.content: Dongfang Electronics Co., Ltd. (hereafter referred to as Dongfang Electronics) is a hi-tech business group, which was founded in 1994, which is a listed company in Shenzhen Stock Exchange（Stock Code: 000682）, combining research and development, manufacturing and operation, technical services and system integration, and one of the major suppliers of China's energy management system solutions.
results.raw_content:
Dongfang Electronics Co., Ltd. (hereafter referred to as Dongfang Electronics) is a hi-tech business group, which was founded in 1994, which is a listed company in Shenzhen Stock Exchange（Stock Code: 000682）, combining research and development, manufacturing and operation, technical services and system integration, and one of the major suppliers of China’s energy management system solutions.
Dongfang Electronics has National Enterprise Technology Center, Post-doctoral Research Workstation, first-level qualification of Computer Information Integration, second-level qualification of Intelligent Architectural Design and Construction, CMMI L5, PCMM L3, ISO9001, ISO14001, OHSAS18000, ISO/IEC20000 and ISO/IEC27001. DFE also participated in the IEC (international standard formulation of Internatinal Electro technical Commission) for making international stardards on behalf of China.
Dongfang Electronics has become the leading role in the power automation industry and has successfully provided technologies and services to customers in China, Sout Asia, Southeast Asia, Africa, South America and Europe, etc. Now, there are about 6 thousand staff distributed in Beijing, Nanjing, Guangzhou, New Delhi, India Branches. For more than consecutive 20 years, DFE has come out top level in the market share of power automation industry in China and aboard, and in the list of "Top 100 Chinese software Enterprises".
Dongfang Electronics regards "Cherish Environment, Treasure Resources" as a vision to incorporate enviremental protection, energy saving, safety and intelligence into business flow and to provide customers with energy system solution. DFE has created a JINGJIN mangement mode, and the core concept of this mode is customer-centered, which means accurate innovation and continuous progress. Today, DFE has formed a system solution of "automation + IT + Internet + energy conservation and environmental protection + energy interconnection", which are from power hardware and software, information service, energy management, to energy conservation and environmental protection. Dongfang Electronics had successfully guaranteed the power supply during the major events such as Beijing Olympic Games, Shanghai World Expo and Guangzhou Asian Games, Hangzhou G20 Summit, etc..
